title: Incorrect Information in Spanish version
body:
I play league in spanish and the dead mans plate description says "+50 de Reducción de Enfriamiento" which would mean 50 cooldown reduction.
Obviously it gives 50 armor instead, can this be fixed?

replies.body:
Hiya Wub a Tub Bub! 

Thanks for the report! We'll get this fixed ASAP!
